alert.note: Alert for Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:51PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central San Miguel County through 315 PM MDT... At 251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Norwood, or 35 miles southwest of Montrose, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Brief moderate to heavy rain will also be possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Norwood around 300 PM MDT. This includes Colorado 145 between mile markers 90 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
